long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some say you can't convey sarcasm through written text. I say different. Use this extension to copy any text on a page to your clipboard with a sarcastic edge and paste it wherever you like 

To use the extension you simply:
1. Write your message, comment, or status 
2. highlight the text you want to convey as sarcasm from your Chrome browser 
3. Right Click on the highlighted text 
4. Click "SarcMark me to clipboard" 
5. Paste it wherever you like 
6. Laugh
